Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ENERGY AND TELECOMMUNICATIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ENERGY AND TELECOMMUNICATIONS

Title: Relates to the municipal sustainable energy loan program
Summary: Relates to the municipal sustainable energy loan program regarding qualifying water improvements, qualifying resiliency improvements and the use of low carbon intensity building components.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to the municipal sustainable energy loan program
